properties.description:
Chrysler Museum of Art

The Chrysler Museum has fifty galleries, a growing collection of more than 30,000 objects, an interactive space for families, and the only glass studio of its kind in the Mid-Atlantic region. Best of all, admission is free.
properties.clean: The Chrysler Museum has fifty galleries, a growing collection of more than 30,000 objects, an interactive space for families, and the only glass studio of its kind in the Mid-Atlantic region. Best of all, admission is free.
properties.name: Chrysler Museum of Art

properties.description:
Battleship Wisconsin

The Battleship Wisconsin is one of the largest and last battleships ever built by the U.S. Navy.
properties.clean: Berthed at Nauticus, the Battleship Wisconsin is one of the largest and last battleships ever built by the U.S. Navy.
properties.name: Battleship Wisconsin

properties.description:
MacArthur Memorial

Memorial to the five-star US Army General who served in three major wars: WWI, Korea and WWII.
properties.clean: Memorial to the five-star US Army General who served in three major wars: WWI, Korea and WWII.
properties.name: MacArthur Memorial

properties.description:
Virginia Zoo

Open daily from 10 am to 5 pm (except on major winter holidays)
properties.clean: Open daily from 10 am to 5 pm (except on major winter holidays)
properties.name: Virginia Zoo

properties.description:
Virginia Stage Company at The Wells Theatre

Virginia Stage Company is a professional, producing theatre company based in Norfolk, VA
properties.clean: Virginia Stage Company is a professional, producing theatre company based in Norfolk, VA
properties.name: Virginia Stage Company at The Wells Theatre

properties.description:
Slover Library

Slover Library is located in beautiful downtown Norfolk on the corner of Plume and Atlantic Street near MacArthur Square and the MacArthur Memorial.
properties.clean: Slover Library is located in beautiful downtown Norfolk on the corner of Plume and Atlantic Street near MacArthur Square and the MacArthur Memorial.
properties.name: Slover Library
